listitem.synopsis: AND boolean1 boolean2 (AND boolean1 boolean2 boolean3 ...)

listitem.para: Outputs TRUE if all inputs are TRUE, otherwise FALSE. All inputs must be TRUE or FALSE.
The comparison is always case-insensitive, regardless of the value of CASEIGNOREDP. That is, "true", "True", and "TRUE" are all the same.
If given no inputs, AND outputs TRUE.

listitem.programlisting: SHOW AND "true "true true SHOW AND "true "false false
